title: Swarm Self-Healing & Auto-Scaling
description: Implement a monitoring agent and control layer that tracks swarm metrics, issues alerts on anomalies, and automatically adjusts the agent fleet size based on workload.
benefits: Resilience through automated recovery when agents stall or fail
Optimized resource usage by scaling agents up/down dynamically
Reduced manual intervention and faster response to high load or errors
tasks: Design and instrument metrics collection (heartbeats, queue depth, throughput)
Implement alerting thresholds and notification system
Integrate dreamctl commands for claim/complete/release to eliminate manual JSON file edits
Build auto-scaling controller to adjust fleet_size via dreamctl or TaskNexus API
Integrate scaling logic into core loop and test under simulated load
